dragon_species.dragonsurvival.dseda_ende:
§7■ §5Ender Dragons §r§7are creatures built for the most part out of magic and obsidian. They're masters of many sorts of magic but lack physical strength. 

§2■ Features: §7End crystal healing, strong abilities and magical capabilities, high power cap. 
§4■ Weakness: §7Slow natural healing, poor physical strength, tough early game.

§7■ §5Ender Dragons §r§7are creatures built for the most part out of magic and obsidian. They're masters of many sorts of magic but lack physical strength. 

§2■ Features: §7End crystal healing, strong abilities and magical capabilities, high power cap. 
§4■ Weakness: §7Slow natural healing, poor physical strength, tough early game.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_ende:
§7■ Deals damage to mobs in range. Damage scales with level. 

§7■ Attack range scales with dragon growth. 

§7■ Holding a glass bottle will fill it up with your own breath.

§7■ Fires dragon fireballs that do damage on impact and leave damaging clouds. 

§7■ Gain stronger projectiles, stronger breath clouds and more projectiles, but also more spread with each level. 

§7■ Holding a bottle while hit or standing in the cloud will fill it up with dragon breath.

§8Note: may hit wrong mobs

§7■ Summons allied endermen that will assist you in combat. 

§7■ their damage, armor and count, but also summoning cost scale based on the ability level.

§7■ §dRitual ability§7 - requires presence of 4 end crystals in a 20 block radius. Cannot be used while flying.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_crys:
§7■ Pulls energy from the nearest end crystal, rapidly restoring hunger and health. 

§7■ The ability doesn't cost mana but disables its regeneration while active. 

§7■ Increase the pulling range and decrease the interval with each level.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_reju:
§7■ While resting on the ground, grants mana regeneration and pulls power from the nearest end crystal every several seconds, restoring hunger and health. 

§7■ Regenerate more mana, increase energy pulling range and decrease energy pulling cooldown with each level, but only when resting on ground.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_ench: §7■ Increases health, luck and ability damage.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_ende: §7■ Increases max mana and experience gained from most sources.

§7■ Increases walk speed. 

§7■ Decreases hunger usage from flight while in the end dimension.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_magi:
§7■ Magic and breath attacks are way less powerful against you, but you're vulnerable to exploding beds (because... reasons). 

§7■ Endermen are significantly less aggressive towards you and rarely retaliate.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_phys: §7■ While ender dragons are profficient at magic, they lack physical strength, which results in reduced mining speed, attack speed and attack knockback.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_ende: §7■ Just like most dragons, you rely on levitation to fly, however ender species are particularly good at harnessing this kind of magic, giving them capabilities that other dragons have to earn.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_thau:
§7■ Unlike most animals, ender dragons feed from magic contained within items rather than chemical energy. 

§7■ Your diet consists of magical materials, however those aren't the best at healing you. You get very little saturation (and thus healing) from most food sources.

§7■ Your magical capabilies are however improved, positively affecting experience gain, mana regeneration and flight efficiency.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_conj:
§7■ Allows you to create items that would normally be obtainable by fighting the ender dragon. 

§7■ §dRitual ability§7 - Requires presence of 4 end crystals in a 20 block radius. Cannot be used while flying. You must be above 100 experience level and hold 1 end crystal in each hand.

§7■ Conjuring items will consume 2 end crystals and 10 experience levels upon activation.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_puri:
§7■ Allows you to remove all dragon-specific negative effects such as broken wings or ender dragon's curse. 

§7■ §dRitual ability§7 - Requires presence of 4 end crystals in a 20 block radius. Cannot be used while flying.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.dseda_gate:
§7■ Can summon a temporary end portal 1 block in front of you.

§7■ §dRitual ability§7 - Requires presence of 4 end crystals in a 20 block radius. Will fail to cast if there's an obstructed 5x5 area in front of you. Cannot be used while flying. 

§7■ The portal will disappear after 30 seconds.
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.dseda_ender_d: Ender dragon body - Not very strong for physical combat, but is built for harnessing magic.
